verses.name: 2 Kings 24:10
verses.text: At that time the servants of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon came up against Jerusalem, and the city was besieged.

verses.name: 2 Kings 24:11
verses.text: And Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon came against the city, and his servants did besiege it.

verses.name: 2 Kings 24:12
verses.text: And Jehoiachin the king of Judah went out to the king of Babylon, he, and his mother, and his servants, and his princes, and his officers: and the king of Babylon took him in the eighth year of his reign.
